name: Holiday Parking Panic!
description:
Note: Try not to drive off the screen.

CONTROLS: 

R = Restart game.

Keyboard: 
W or Up Arrow : Throttle
S or Down Arrow : Brake/Reverse
A or Left Arrow : Turn Left
D or Right Arrow : Turn Right
Shift : Rainbow Booster

Gamepad:
 (A) : Throttle
(B) : Brake/Reverse
Joypad Left : Turn Left
Joypad Right : Turn Right
Right Shoulder: Rainbow Booster

Game Credits:
 Art, Design, Coding, SFX, FormalCloud (designby.cloud)

Music: "Wish wish you" and "Jingle Bells", Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)  Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
